original_text: Jotham took his army to attack the king of Ammon. He won the battle against them. That year, the Ammonites gave to him 3,400 kilograms of silver. They also gave him 2,200 kilolitres of wheat and 2,200 kilolitres of barley. The Ammonites paid Jotham the same amount for each of the next two years.
korean_text: 암몬 자손의 왕과 더불어 싸워 그들을 이겼더니 그 해에 암몬 자손이 은 백 달란트와 밀 만 고르와 보리 만 고르를 바쳤고 제이년과 제삼년에도 암몬 자손이 그와 같이 바쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Jotham took his army to attack
sentences.korean_translation: 요담은 그의 군대를 이끌고 공격하러 갔다

sentences.original_text: He won the battle against them
the Ammonites gave to him 3,400 kilograms of silver
They also gave him 2,200 kilolitres of wheat
The Ammonites paid Jotham the same amount
sentences.korean_translation: 암몬 사람들은 요담에게 똑같은 양을 지불했다

sentences.original_text: for each of the next two years
